Here are your Redis metrics for {{ today }}!

{% comment %}
Format of `metrics` is:

    [
        ('slug-1',
            {'day': '4', 'month': '4', 'week': '352321', 'year': '2129'}
        ),

        ('slug-2',
            {'day': None, 'month': None, 'week': '303669', 'year': '3594'}
        ),
    ]
{% endcomment %}

{% for slug, data in metrics %}
=== {{ slug|upper }} ===
Day:   {{ data.day }}
Week:  {{ data.week }}
Month: {{ data.month }}
Year:  {{ data.year }}

{% endfor %}
